name: X Rebirth VR Edition
description: X Rebirth VR Edition is tailored to be an immersive VR experience, based on X Rebirth: Home of Light. TRADE, FIGHT, BUILD, THINK in the X Universe - the biggest sandbox this side of the galaxy.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD equivalent (VULKAN support) Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD equivalent (VULKAN support) Storage: 12 GB available space
